product.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud Carbon Edition - Cologne for Men - Long Lasting Perfume for Men - Arabian Perfume - Men's Cologne - Oud Perfume - 3.4 oz
product.product_description: Al Haramain Amber Oud Carbon Edition is a sophisticated fragrance that captures the essence of timeless masculinity. This oud and amber perfume for men features an aromatic blend, starting with fresh top notes of lavender, rosemary, and bergamot, evoking a sense of calm and clarity. The heart reveals a captivating fusion of geranium, sage, and marine accord, offering an aromatic journey that feels both invigorating and comforting. Base notes of moss, cedarwood, vetiver, and amber emerge, adding depth and warmth for a scent that connects you to the earth. Crafted with the finest ingredients, this Arabian perfume for men provides a long-lasting scent experience that makes a statement wherever you go. With its elegant bottle design, Amber Oud stands as a symbol of luxury and refinement. This long-lasting perfume is an Arabic cologne for men that is both distinctive and memorable. Ideal for any occasion, from daily wear to special events, it's a fragrance that speaks of confidence, style, and a love for high-quality scents. Experience the allure of this manly fragrance that captures the spirit of Arabian perfume craftsmanship.
product.safety_information: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
product.ingredients_list: Alcohol, Bht, Parfum, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, Water, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Linalool, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Limonene
